name: Time Dungeon (Artur Nista)
description:
You found yourself on a mysterious dungeon
Find a way out and save yourself.

Every action you perform, your time reduces;

If you run out of time, your health reduces;

If you run out of health, you DIE.

Find items, fight enemies, become stronger, and leave the dungeon.

HOW TO PLAY

WASD: Move
E: Pick Up equipments and items
SPACE: Use your item

ASSETS
